content: to first st before gap p2tog p1 turn needle #3 k1 ssk knit to end of needle repeat row 3 & 4 until all heel flap sts worked r2 & r3 knit all sts note for xl & m only last 2 rounds of decreases will be worked as follows all sizes r1 sl1 k to last st before gap ssk turn repeat r1 r2 &-r3 until 52 /56 /56 / 52 sts remain r2 sl1 p to last st before gap p2tog then repeat r1 & r2 until 32 /36 /32 /36 sts remain then 18 / 18 / 20 / 20 sts flap sts remaining repeat r1 decreasing every round until 16 /16 /20 / 20 sts remain 18 / 19 / 22 / 25 rounds worked gussets needle #1 knit 9 / 9/ 10 / 10sts place marker marks start of round finishing graft toe sew in ends block gently k 9 / 9 / 10 /10sts pickup & knit 16 / 17 / 18 / 19sts along left hand side of gusset decathlon garter rib socks © sue grandfield 2016 riotousassembly on ravelry 1
